languages.text: {n}Оружие искрит и нагревается в руках — еще секунда, и экран обжег бы ваши пальцы. Саргона устало ухмыляется.{/n}
{n}Your weapon sparks and heats up in your hands — another second and the screen would have burnt your fingers. Sargona gives you a tired grin.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Оружие искрит и нагревается в руках — еще секунда, и экран обжег бы ваши пальцы. Саргона устало ухмыляется.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Your weapon sparks and heats up in your hands — another second and the screen would have burnt your fingers. Sargona gives you a tired grin.{/n}
{n}Your shot flies within a hair's breadth of Sargona's head. The pirate just gives you a tired grin in response.{/n}
{n}Your weapon sparks and heats up in your hands — another second and the screen would have burnt your fingers. Sargona gives you a tired grin.{/n}
{n}Your shot flies within a hair's breadth of Sargona's head. The pirate gives you merely a tired grin in response.{/n}
{n}Your weapon sparks and heats up in your hands — another second and the screen would have burnt your fingers. Sargona gives you a tired grin.{/n}
{n}Your weapon sparks and heats up in your hands — another second and the screen would have burnt your fingers. Sargona gives you a tired grin.{/n}
{n}Your weapon sparks and heats up in your hands — another second and the screen would have burnt your fingers. Sargona gives you a tired grin.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tu arma chisporrotea y se calienta en tus manos; un segundo más, y la pantalla te habría quemado los dedos. Sargona esboza una sonrisa de hastío.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your weapon sparks and heats up in your hands — another second and the screen would have burnt your fingers. Sargona gives you a tired grin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tu arma chisporrotea y se calienta en tus manos; un segundo más, y la pantalla te habría quemado los dedos. Sargona esboza una sonrisa de hastío.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你的武器火花迸射，猛然发烫。要是再多碰一秒，你的手指恐怕就要被屏障烫伤了。见此情形，萨戈纳对你露出了疲惫的笑容。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your weapon sparks and heats up in your hands — another second and the screen would have burnt your fingers. Sargona gives you a tired grin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你的武器火花迸射，猛然发烫。要是再多碰一秒，你的手指恐怕就要被屏障烫伤了。见此情形，萨戈纳对你露出了疲惫的笑容。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Votre arme lance des étincelles et chauffe entre vos mains ; une seconde de plus, et l'écran vous aurait brûlé les doigts. Sargona vous sourit, fatigué.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your weapon sparks and heats up in your hands — another second and the screen would have burnt your fingers. Sargona gives you a tired grin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Votre arme lance des étincelles et chauffe entre vos mains ; une seconde de plus, et l'écran vous aurait brûlé les doigts. Sargona vous sourit, fatigué.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたの武器は火花を散らし、手の中で熱をもっていった。もう一秒遅ければ、スクリーンがあなたの指を焼いていただろう。サルゴナは疲れたような笑みを浮かべた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your weapon sparks and heats up in your hands — another second and the screen would have burnt your fingers. Sargona gives you a tired grin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたの武器は火花を散らし、手の中で熱をもっていった。もう一秒遅ければ、スクリーンがあなたの指を焼いていただろう。サルゴナは疲れたような笑みを浮かべた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Silahın kıvılcımlar saçıp ellerinde ısınıyor. Bir saniye daha geçse ekran parmaklarını yakacaktı. Sargona sana yorgun bir sırıtış atıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your weapon sparks and heats up in your hands — another second and the screen would have burnt your fingers. Sargona gives you a tired grin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Silahın kıvılcımlar saçıp ellerinde ısınıyor. Bir saniye daha geçse ekran parmaklarını yakacaktı. Sargona sana yorgun bir sırıtış atıyor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Deine Waffe schlägt Funken und wird in deinen Händen heiß – eine Sekunde länger, und der Schirm hätte dir die Finger verbrannt. Sargona grinst dich müde an.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your weapon sparks and heats up in your hands — another second and the screen would have burnt your fingers. Sargona gives you a tired grin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Deine Waffe schlägt Funken und wird in deinen Händen heiß – eine Sekunde länger, und der Schirm hätte dir die Finger verbrannt. Sargona grinst dich müde an.{/n}
